QuestionTxt: (I'm going to read you a list of specific elements or parts of the (2010 health reform) law. For each, please tell me whether you think it is something the law does, or not.) To the best of your knowledge, would you say the health reform law does or does not...provide financial help to low and moderate income Americans who don't get insurance through their jobs to help them purchase coverage?
StudyNote: 750 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 755 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 421 who had no landline telephone.

RespTxt: No, law does not do this
